title: League of Legends Crashing
body:
Hello, few months ago I started experiencing league crashing. It crashes when i am in game at random times. It doesn't look like other software interfering with it as I tried clean boot.

It is also not driver problem as I have the latest version. I don't even get bugsplat but it just crashes. I have also done everything that Riot told me to do but nothing seems to work. My last hope is formatting windows in case it is faulty.

I also think that my graphic card might be the problem but I only crash in league and  in other games. 

If anyone knows what might be the problem and what can i do then please suggest something.

replies.body: Do you notice any particular behavior when the crashes happen? Low fps, screen stutters, high latency, attempting to reconnect messages? With a bit more info, we can work through some steps to solve this.
